messages.ssml:
<speak>
    ePragati Authority seeks to help Gooverment of AP realize the vision of ,Sunrise AP 2022 by supporting the 7 development missions launched by the Government of AP in the areas of e-Governance<break time="2s"/>
     1,Primary sector<break time="1000ms"/>
     2,Social Empowerment<break time="1000ms"/>
     3,Knowledge Skills<break time="1000ms"/>
     4,Urban Development<break time="1000ms"/>
     5,Industry sector<break time="1000ms"/>
     6,Infrastructure sector<break time="1000ms"/>
     7,Service sector<break time="1000ms"/>
     Mention any of the above 
     <break time="3s"/>
     Do you want to continue
</speak>

messages.title: Mission in E-pragati
messages.formattedText: Towards achieving the above, the GoAP has constituted the Andhra Pradesh e-Governance Authority as a society registered under the Andhra Pradesh Societies Registration Act, 2001 having its registered office at APIIC, Industrial Estate, Auto Nagar, Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh (“ePragati Authority”). ePragati Authority seeks to help GoAP realize the vision of ‘Sunrise AP 2022’ by supporting the 7 development missions launched by the GoAP in the areas of eGovernance.
